meanings.definition: A representation of the Virgin Mary mourning over the body of the dead Christ, typically shown in art.
meanings.sent1: The pieta in the church moved me to tears.
meanings.sent2: The artist's pieta captured the sorrow of Mary beautifully.
meanings.sent3: At the art exhibit, the pieta seemed to be whispering secrets to the other sculptures.
meanings.sent4: The pieta's emotion reached out and touched the hearts of all who gazed upon it.
meanings.sent5: The pieta's beauty and sadness lingered in my mind long after I left the gallery.

meanings.definition: A sculpture or painting depicting the Virgin Mary holding the dead body of Jesus Christ.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, the pieta stood out among the other artworks.
meanings.sent2: The pieta's details were so lifelike, it felt as if Mary and Jesus were real.
meanings.sent3: During the tour, the pieta made visitors stop and ponder the fragility of life.
meanings.sent4: The pieta's serenity amidst tragedy was a powerful reminder of faith and love.
meanings.sent5: The pieta's gentle embrace symbolized the eternal bond between mother and son.
